TopicTitle: A mod for snapping parts into place along the height?

Articles.Content:
You know you can set the parts to click into place along the circumference of your rocket (the toggle next to symmetry) this is nice for making sure you're attachments are properly aligned to NSWE or whatever, but there's no such "snap" for height. On small scale stuff this isn't too big a deal, but on larger rockets it starts to become more noticeable. Especially when I try to build elaborate things that connect via docking ports and I find that I'm off by just a few pixels because the height was different on something or other.

I do hope they eventually add height-snapping (or whatever it's called) into the game, but until then I'll settle for a mod if one exists.

EDIT:

Toggle vertical snap mode. That's what it's called.
